summary: This code deletes a file named "example_docstring.docx", then uses Python's "convert_utf8.py" script to convert a file to UTF-8 encoding, and finally generates a new DOCX file using Pandoc by converting an MD file (example_docstring_utf8.md) with the output saved as example_docstring.docx.

details.comment: This code deletes a file named "example_docstring.docx", then uses Python's "convert_utf8.py" script to convert a file to UTF-8 encoding, and finally generates a new DOCX file using Pandoc by converting an MD file (example_docstring_utf8.md) with the output saved as example_docstring.docx.
details.content:
rm example_docstring.docx
python .\convert_utf8.py # use iconv instead. installed along with busybox.
pandoc example_docstring_utf8.md -o example_docstring.docx
